    • org.apache.flink.core.fs中FileSystem的使用

      返回FileSystem的org.apache.flink.core.fs中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static FileSystem FileSystem.get(URI uri)
      Returns a reference to the FileSystem instance for accessing the file system identified by the given URI.
      FileSystem Path.getFileSystem()
      Returns the FileSystem that owns this Path.
      static FileSystem FileSystem.getLocalFileSystem()
      Returns a reference to the FileSystem instance for accessing the local file system.
      参数类型为FileSystem的org.apache.flink.core.fs中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Path Path.makeQualified(FileSystem fs)
      Returns a qualified path object.

    • org.apache.flink.core.fs.local中FileSystem的使用

      org.apache.flink.core.fs.local中FileSystem的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  LocalFileSystem
      The class LocalFile provides an implementation of the FileSystem interface for the local file system.
      参数类型为FileSystem的org.apache.flink.core.fs.local中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      LocalFileStatus(File f, FileSystem fs)
      Creates a LocalFileStatus object from a given File object.

    • org.apache.flink.util中FileSystem的使用

      参数类型为FileSystem的org.apache.flink.util中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static boolean FileUtils.deletePathIfEmpty(FileSystem fileSystem, Path path)
      Deletes the path if it is empty (does not contain any other directories/files).
